arts.ttl: Oladapo Afolayan: Who is the English striker helping St. Pauli's push for Bundesliga survival?
arts.sum: Having developed at West Ham and Bolton, speedy English attacker Oladapo Afolayan has been enjoying his time at St. Pauli of late. Solihull Moors of the English non-leagues were the first senior outfit Afolayan would represent, and 15 goals at the club over a year aroused the interest of another big name from London.

arts.ttl: Afolayan's late strike rescues point for St. Pauli against Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Oladapo Afolayan's 85th-minute equaliser proved crucial for St. Pauli whose dominance in possession was finally rewarded against a Gladbach side who had led at the break through Ko Itakura's well-directed header. The second half saw St. Pauli continue their dominance, with Manolis Saliakas and Sinani testing Cardoso early on.

arts.ttl: St Pauli strike late to earn point against Gladbach
arts.sum: Dapo Afolayan's late equaliser earned FC St. Pauli a point at home to Gladbach.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. Gladbach preview: Die Fohlen continue Champions League push
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach will continue their quest for Champions League qualification when they travel to Millerntor-Stadion for Sunday’s meeting with St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: Preview: St Pauli vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between St Pauli and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
